Patrick , who was 20 when he was charged , said he was a member of the Vice Lords gang and had been arrested about 15 times .
He was well - known on his block when police scooped him up as a murder suspect .
But the night of the murder he had been at a friend 's house - a fact that played a role in his release , Chanen said .
